title: Quarkus 3.2.7.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 3.2.7.Final, the seventh maintenance release of our 3.2 LTS release train.  This release fixes several CVEs:   * , upgrading Snappy Java library version to 1.1.10.5   * upgrading Apache Avro version to 1.11.3   * upgrading Netty version to Netty to 4.1.100  And one bug:   *   It should be a safe upgrade for anyone already using 3.2.  If you are not already using 3.2, please refer to .   FULL CHANGELOG  You can get .   COME JOIN US  We value your feedback a lot so please report bugs, ask for improvements… Let’s build something great together!  If you are a Quarkus user or just curious, don’t be shy and join our welcoming community:   * provide feedback on ;   * craft some code and ;   * discuss with us on and on the ;   * ask your questions on .
